Uses of Class
org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.TNCException

    • Uses of TNCException in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc

      Methods in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc that throw TNCException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IMC.batchEnding(IMCConnection c)
      The TNC Client calls this method to notify IMCs that all IMV messages received in a batch have been delivered and this is the IMC's last chance to send a message in the batch of IMC messages currently being collected.
      void IMC.beginHandshake(IMCConnection c)
      The TNC Client calls this method to indicate that an Integrity Check Handshake is beginning and solicit messages from IMCs for the first batch.
      Object AttributeSupport.getAttribute(long attributeID)
      A call to this method gets the value of the attribute identified by attributeID for an object in the IMC package which implements this interface.
      void IMC.initialize(TNCC tncc)
      The TNC Client calls this method to initialize the IMC and agree on the API version number to be used.
      void IMC.notifyConnectionChange(IMCConnection c, long newState)
      Informs the IMC that the state of the network connection identified by connection parameter has changed to a new state.
      void IMC.receiveMessage(IMCConnection c, long messageType, byte[] message)
      The TNC Client calls this method to deliver a message to the IMC.
      void IMCLong.receiveMessageLong(IMCConnection c, long messageFlags, long messageVendorID, long messageSubtype, byte[] message, long sourceIMVID, long destinationIMCID)
      The TNC Client calls this method (if supported by the TNCC and implemented by an IMC) to deliver a message to the IMC.
      void IMCSOH.receiveMessageSOH(IMCConnection c, long systemHealthID, byte[] sohrReportEntry)
      The TNC Client calls this method (if supported by the TNCC and implemented by an IMC) to deliver an SOHRReportEntry message to the IMC.
      void TNCC.reportMessageTypes(IMC imc, long[] supportedTypes)
      A call to this method is used to inform a TNCC about the set of message types the IMC is able to receive.
      void TNCCLong.reportMessageTypesLong(IMC imc, long[] supportedVendorIDs, long[] supportedSubtypes)
      A call to this method is used to inform a TNCC about the set of message types that the IMC wishes to receive.
      void TNCC.requestHandshakeRetry(IMC imc, long reason)
      IMCs can call this method to ask a TNCC to retry an Integrity Check Handshake for all current network connections.
      void IMCConnection.requestHandshakeRetry(long reason)
      An IMC calls this method to ask a IMC Connection to retry an Integrity Check Handshake.
      long TNCCLong.reserveAdditionalIMCID(IMC imc)
      An IMC calls this method to reserve an additional IMC ID for itself.
      void IMCConnection.sendMessage(long messageType, byte[] message)
      An IMC calls this method to give a message to the TNCC for delivery.
      void IMCConnectionLong.sendMessageLong(long messageFlags, long messageVendorID, long messageSubtype, byte[] message, long sourceIMCID, long destinationIMVID)
      An IMC calls this method to give a message to the TNCC for delivery.
      void IMCConnectionSOH.sendMessageSOH(byte[] sohReportEntry)
      An IMC calls this method (if implemented by the TNCC) to give a SoHReportEntry to the TNCC for delivery.
      void AttributeSupport.setAttribute(long attributeID, Object attributeValue)
      An IMC calls this method to set the value of the attribute identified by attributeID an object in the IMC package which implements this interface.
      void IMC.terminate()
      Closes down the IMC.
